rules.title: Formula from Standards Book I
rules.description:
['CD
TUBE AND PLUG SHEET TO TOP AND BOTTOM PLATE
45~~.
SEE (TOP OR 8TM PLATE)
~NOTE 2
//Y'.~~L t na"
1/2 PL == 45'
":'I'<:t"
5/8 PL == 40'
3/4 PL == 35'
over 3/4 PL == 15'
JOINT PREPARA nON (TUBE OR
NOTES: PLUG SHEET)
1. BEVELS CAN BE MACHINED, FLAME CUT OR CARBON ARC GOUGED.
2. SHOP MAY USE CARBON ARC TO SHAPE BOTTOM OF MACHINED OR FLAME
CUT BEVELS.
3. t == THICKNESS OF THINNER PLATE.
WELD PROC. NO.:
Data Issued', '']
